title: A graft-to strategy of poly(vinylphosphonates) on dopazide-coated gold nanoparticles using in situ catalyst activation
content:

Philipp Weingarten, Sophie R. Thomas, Ana Luiza de Andrade Querino, Kerstin Halama, Moritz Kränzlein, Angela Casini, Bernhard Rieger
A graft-to-strategy to tether alkyne-terminated polyesters to the surface of dopazide stabilised AuNPs via click chemistry in aqueous conditions in situ.
